data.title: Oracle ERP Solutions
data.meta_description: Oracle ERP Solutions - Mphasis strategic alliance helps accelerate companies transformation journey through the implementation of Oracle-based business solutions. Check Mphasis Oracle ERP solutions for more services.
data.text:
As an Oracle ERP Partner, we offer our clients:

• Proven implementation and ADM services across Finance, Human Capital Management (HCM), Supply Chain Management (SCM), and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) domains

• End-to-end service capability— Functional, Technical, Apps, and Core DBA

• Significant project experience in Real Estate, Manufacturing, BFSI, Energy, and Logistics sectors

• Effective accelerators and tools:

• Mphasis upgrade solutions and transformation services

• 200+ proprietary tools and accelerators (such as a common integration framework, data masking, assessment health checks, chatbot-eXa, MTAT [test administration], MCAT [code administration])

• Vast partner ecosystem for new-age domains and consulting capabilities

Our collective knowledge and experience come to the fore to deliver value through:

• Rigorous and continuous knowledge management

• Improved stability

• Improved automation of operational processes

• Effective problem management

• Increased self-help (knowledge base) efficiencies in consolidation and standardization
